name: hyperdash
title: Hyperdash
description: v1.0.7 - Manage Obsidian projects and tasks with TaskNotes 4.0.1 compatibility. Tag-based filtering, smart sorting, recurrence patterns, and time tracking.
author: jeremyallen

preferences.name: vaultPath
preferences.title: Task Notes Path
preferences.description: Path to scan for todos (e.g., /path/to/vault/todos for better performance)

preferences.name: projectPath
preferences.title: Project Path
preferences.description: Path to scan for projects. Set to full vault root for all projects.

preferences.name: basesTodoFile
preferences.title: Todo Base Path
preferences.description: Path to your Bases .base file containing todo tag definitions

preferences.name: basesProjectFile
preferences.title: Project Base Path
preferences.description: Path to your Bases .base file containing project tag definitions

preferences.name: showRecurrence
preferences.title: Display Features
preferences.label: Show recurrence info
preferences.description: Display recurrence patterns for recurring tasks

preferences.name: maxResults
preferences.title: Performance
preferences.description: Maximum number of tasks to display (default: 500, helps with large vaults)
